Clear.Label: clear
Clear.Description: A clear day. No penalties or modifiers.

Fog.Label: fog
Fog.Description: Fog reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons.

Rain.Label: rain
Rain.Description: Rain reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

DryThunderstorm.Label: dry thunderstorm
DryThunderstorm.Description: Dry thunderstorms are dangerous because the lightning can start fires and there is no rain to put them out.

RainyThunderstorm.Label: rainy thunderstorm
RainyThunderstorm.Description: The lightning will start fires, but the rain will put it out. The rain also reduces movement speed and shooting accuracy.

SnowHard.Label: hard snow
SnowHard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

SnowGentle.Label: gentle snow
SnowGentle.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

BloodRain.Label: blood rain
BloodRain.Description: Anyone exposed to the blood rain for long enough will be driven into a berserk rage. Certain traits and psychic sensitivity influence the berserk effect.

ToxRain.Label: tox rain
ToxRain.Description: Tox rain makes creatures sick with toxic buildup. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

Sandstorm.Label: sandstorm
Sandstorm.Description: Sandstorms reduce the accuracy of ranged weapons, slow people down, and get sand everywhere.

BlindFog.Label: blind fog
BlindFog.Description: A heavy fog that reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, as well as their maximum range.

Overcast.Label: overcast
Overcast.Description: Thick clouds obscure the sky, reducing light levels.

Blizzard.Label: blizzard
Blizzard.Description: Snow reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

TorrentialRain.Label: torrential rain
TorrentialRain.Description: Torrential rain causes flooding. It also reduces the accuracy of ranged weapons, extinguishes fire, and slows people down.

VPE_Hurricane.Label: hurricane
VPE_Hurricane.Description: Extreme wind will cause a slowdown to everyone not under the roof.

VPEH_Bloodstorm.Label: bloodstorm
VPEH_Bloodstorm.Description: Mystical downpour of blood, caused by forbidden hemosage psycast. While non-hemogenic individuals are choking on blood, sanguophages regenerate hemogen and can cast psycasts without worrying about psychic heat.

TM_HealingRainWD.Label: healing rain
TM_HealingRainWD.Description: A gentle rain with healing properties. Any creature exposed to healing rain will slowly regenerate their wounds.

TM_HailstormWD.Label: hail storm
TM_HailstormWD.Description: A fierce hailstorm that sheets swathes of land in deadly waves of ice. Movement and accuracy are severely hampered.
